channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fox News Politics: 'Festivus' Follie$
item.description: Welcome to the Fox News Politics newsletter, with the latest updates on the Trump transition, exclusive interviews and more Fox News politics content.

item.title: Trump rep says Biden move to commute sentences for most death row inmates a 'slap in the face' to victims
item.description: President-elect Biden has been criticized for commuting the death sentences for 37 federal inmates, despite their violent crimes.

item.title: US Airstrike in Syria Kills 2 ISIS Operatives
item.description: The U.S. military said Monday it conducted an airstrike in Syria that killed two Islamic State operatives and wounded one.

item.title: Biden Administration Withdraws Two Student Loan Plans
item.description: The Biden administration withdrew on Friday two major student loan forgiveness plans.
